body:
Comment 5: 
My dwarfdump (-V says April 10, 2012) doesn't have a '--all'. Running `dwarfdump -a -v
simple` gives me this output:
---
.debug_info

CU_HEADER:
  cu_header_length = 0x00036931 223537
  version_stamp    = 0x0002     2
  abbrev_offset    = 0x00000000 0
  address_size     = 0x08       8

COMPILE_UNIT<header overall offset = 0x00000000>:
< 0><0x0000000b>  DW_TAG_compile_unit <abbrev 1>
                    DW_AT_name                  "go"
                    DW_AT_language              DW_LANG_Go
                    DW_AT_low_pc                0x00400c00
                    DW_AT_high_pc               0x0047df31
                    DW_AT_stmt_list             0x00000000

LOCAL_SYMBOLS:
< 1><0x00000024>    DW_TAG_subprogram <abbrev 2>
                      DW_AT_name                  "main.main"
                      DW_AT_low_pc                0x00400c00
                      DW_AT_high_pc               0x00400ec0
                      DW_AT_external              yes(1)
< 1><0x00000041>    DW_TAG_subprogram <abbrev 2>
                      DW_AT_name                  "main.init"
                      DW_AT_low_pc                0x00400ec0
                      DW_AT_high_pc               0x00400f10
                      DW_AT_external              yes(1)
< 1><0x0000005e>    DW_TAG_subprogram <abbrev 2>
                      DW_AT_name                  "type..hash.[1]interface {}"
                      DW_AT_low_pc                0x00400f10
                      DW_AT_high_pc               0x00401040
                      DW_AT_external              yes(1)
< 2><0x0000008b>      DW_TAG_variable <abbrev 4>
                        DW_AT_name                  "i"
                        DW_AT_location              <lowpc=0x00000000><highpc=0xffffffffffffffff><from .debug_info offset 0x0000008f>DW_OP_call_frame_cfa DW_OP_consts -32 DW_OP_plus
                        DW_AT_type                  <global die offset 0x000244f5>

.debug_line: line number info for a single cu

dwarfdump ERROR:  dwarf_srclines:  DW_DLE_LINE_NUM_OPERANDS_BAD (56)

CU Name = "go"
CU Producer = "<CU-missing-DW_AT_producer>"
DIE OFF = 0x0000008b GOFF = 0x0000008b, Low PC = 0x00400c00, High PC = 0x0047df31
---

The dwarf_srclines error looks relevant, but I get it also when building with Go 1.2.

Using the built-in `println` instead of `fmt.Println` has the same gdb behavior, but a
smaller executable, so that might be a simpler problem to work with.
